original_text: Joseph was still in the house when Judah and his brothers came in, and they threw themselves to the ground before him.
korean_text: 유다와 그의 형제들이 요셉의 집에 이르니 요셉이 아직 그 곳에 있는지라 그의 앞에서 땅에 엎드리니

sentences.original_text: Joseph was still in the house
when Judah and his brothers came in
and they threw themselves to the ground before him
